name: Laser-Puzzle-Trooper
description:
This game was planned to create with a team of 4, but ended up made almost fully by me alone, so the state of the game now is - early prototype.

I will continue to work on it till i'm pleased with it.

Music created by St. Leo IX

Coding, idea and whatnot: 42Kami 

Level design:  Kestya and 42Kami

I really appreciate feedback! Please don't be shy and tell us about your experience with the game, likes and dislikes and bugs if any   ^^
